thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Super Nice Hotel
thread.title_full: Super Nice Hotel - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Freedreec
title: Super Nice Hotel
text: Very good location, nice restaurants just around the corner, very friendly and service-minded staff, very nice and clean room with good beds and not least a really super-great breakfast. Our family stayed 4 nights and enjoyed it a lot. Our daughter happen to have her birthday during the stay and it was such a sweet surprise as the hotel must have found this out in our registration and treated her with a surprise birthday cake at our breakfast table! We would love to come back again.
